attributes.action: Give the British Public A Referendum on the EU Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not fair that we should have the EU constitution forced upon us without a say. An overwhelming majority of the country want a referendum and most of us do not want an EU Constitution. Either way we deserve a say!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
